Pre-Game Insights: Australia will play a three-match T20I bilateral series in Scotland's Grange Cricket Club, Edinburgh starting from Wednesday, 4th September. This will be Australia's first T20I series after the ICC T20 World Cup 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Aussies will move to England after the series for a white-ball series including Three T20Is and five ODIs.
Others: The live streaming of Australia's Tour Of Scotland 2024 will be available on the FanCode app and website.
The AUS vs SCO T20I matches will start at 6:30 PM IST.
